Investigation further revealed that the suspects had stolen food from the business as well. The suspects were apprehended in a nearby subdivision and identified as juveniles. The suspects were taken into custody and transported to the Juvenile Detention Center and served with petitions charging them with robbery conspiracy to commit a felony and petit larceny. The clerk was treated on the scene for a minor injury. Two of the juveniles ages 15 and 16 are residents of Fairfax County. The third juvenile age 15 is a resident of the City of Fairfax.
